modName: Bodies by Race More Exaggerated Nude Replacers
summary: New body types (Nude CBBE TBBP) for Puffs Bodies by Race mod.
descriptionHtml:
**************************************************************************
* Bodies by Race More Exaggerated Nude Replacers *
**************************************************************************

===========
Description:
===========
This is my own customization of Puffs Bodies by Race mod. I simply replaced the original meshes with one I made in bodyslide. I wanted to make some of the differences between races a little more dramatic, I also included nude meshes to replace the vanilla underwear look. 
I did not customize the Argonians and the Khajiit, either because I am lazy or I don\'t care what they look like naked. My customization only effects the Altmer, Bosmer, Bretons, Dunmer, Imperials, Nords, Orsimer, and Redguard. 

Description of Body Types:
Altmer: Large bust and Petite.
Bosmer: Athletic and Petite.
Breton: Curvy and Petite.
Dunmer: Large bottom and Petite.
Imperial: Large bottom.
Nord: Large bust.
Orsimer: Muscular.
Redguard: Athletic.

==============
Requirements
==============
Puffs Bodies By Race 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32154
The TBBP animation of Dragonfly with butt bounce
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34713
XP32 Maximum Skeleton XPMS
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800

============
Installation
============
1. Install Puffs Bodies by Race.
2. Install The TBBP animation of Dragonfly with butt bounce
3. Install XP32 Maximum Skeleton XPMS
4. Drop my files into your Data/Meshes folder and overwrite.

===============
Credit goes to:
===============
Puffs Bodies by Race for CBBE by Puff
Cubic Hair 3D - CBBE for BodySlide Plus Plus by EliteCheat
The TBBP animation of Dragonfly with butt bounce by Dragonfly LeCid and Shaomarc
XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32

Please vote for Puffs Bodies by Race, it\'s a great mod.
author: Onemonkeysrage

files.changelogHtml: Now supports Argonian and Khajiit races.
